author: @anhodieu4225
text:
[Verse 1: SeungKwan, DK]
Allyeojwo neoui oneul
Jjippudunghaetdeon achimbuteo
Manwone nochin bus
Taxireul tayaman haesseotdeon
Rush hour
Neoui pyojeong algo sipeo
Sandeomicheoreom ssain ilgwa saram gwangye
Bap meokgo namyeon seureureu nun gamgineun
Neoui moseup gunggeum neoui haruga gunggeumhae

[Pre-Chorus: HOSHI]
Jomcheoreom maeumdaero doeji anneun ildeureul
Suhak munjecheoreom pulji mothaedo
Uri saiui gongsigi yеogi isseo baro

[Chorus: SeungKwan & DK, HOSHI & DK]
Ilgobsie manna yaksok jangso hangang
Dari ogi jeonе neorang na kkok manna
Uri gongsik dabi yeogi uri nunape itjana
Gin gin haru jina uri duri manna
Nongdamgeorie jichin harureul hanjan
Bami neomu ppalli onda
Sigana meomchwora
Be here with me

[Verse 2: Peder Elias]
I'm tryna stay afloat but I'm in deep
Oh, I'm so tired I can't even sleep
Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody

[Pre-Chorus: Peder Elias]
And I keep saying okay (Okay)
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say (They say)
While looking like you're happy as hell
(Oh, I) I really hope that you feel the same
(Oh, I) Tonight

[Chorus: Peder Elias]
Come meet me at seven
And stay 'til eleven
But won't go to bed then
'Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah, it's true though
Kinda cool so
Let's just stay right here tonight (Let's just stay right here)
At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out (Oh)
And dance to the moonlight
'Cause everything feels right (Oh-oh)
Been a long day
But it's okay
'Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

[Outro: DK, Peder Elias]
Oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be here with me

author: @moumitagoswami2005
text:
알려줘 너의 오늘
찌뿌둥했던 아침부터
만원에 놓친 Bus
Taxi를 타야만 했었던
Rush hour
너의 표정 알고 싶어
산더미처럼 쌓인 일과 사람 관계
밥 먹고 나면 스르르 눈 감기는
너의 모습 궁금 너의 하루가 궁금해
좀처럼 마음대로 되지 않는 일들을
수학 문제처럼 풀지 못해도
우리 사이의 공식이 여기 있어 바로
7시에 만나 약속 장소 한강
달이 오기 전에 너랑 나 꼭 만나
우리 공식 답이 여기 우리 눈앞에 있잖아
긴 긴 하루 지나 우리 둘이 만나
농담거리에 지친 하루를 한잔
밤이 너무 빨리 온다
시간아 멈춰라
Be here with me
I'm tryna stay afloat, but I'm in deep
Oh, I'm so tired, I can't even sleep
Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody
And I keep saying okay
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say while looking like you're happy as hell, oh, I
I really hope that you feel the same, oh, I tonight
Come meet me at seven
And stay 'til eleven
But won't go to bed then
'Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah, it's true tho
Kinda cool, so
Let's just stay right here tonight
At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out
And dance to the moonlight
'Cause everything feels right
Been a long day
But it's okay
'Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be here with me

text:
Allyeojwo neoui oneul

Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody

I never listen to my own heart

While looking like you're happy as hell
Oh, I, I really hope that you feel the same
Oh, I, tonight

At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out (Oh)
And dance to the moonlight
'Cause everything feels right (Oh-oh)
Been a long day
But it's okay
'Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be, be here with me

Uri saiui gongsigi yеogi isseo baro

author: @sj-gy6lg
text:
알려줘 너의 오늘
찌뿌둥했던 아침부터
만원에 놓친 Bus
Taxi를 타야만 했었던
Rush hour
너의 표정 알고 싶어
산더미처럼 쌓인 일과 사람 관계
밥 먹고 나면 스르르 눈 감기는
너의 모습 궁금 너의 하루가 궁금해
좀처럼 마음대로 되지 않는 일들을
수학 문제처럼 풀지 못해도
우리 사이의 공식이 여기 있어 바로
7시에 만나 약속 장소 한강
달이 오기 전에 너랑 나 꼭 만나
우리 공식 답이 여기 우리 눈앞에 있잖아
긴 긴 하루 지나 우리 둘이 만나
농담거리에 지친 하루를 한잔
밤이 너무 빨리 온다
시간아 멈춰라
Be here with me
I'm tryna stay afloat but I'm in deep
Oh I'm so tired I can't even sleep
Oh and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody
And I keep saying okay
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say while looking like you're happy as hell oh I
I really hope that you feel the same oh I tonight
Come meet me at seven
And stay 'til eleven
But won't go to bed then
Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah it's true tho
Kinda cool so
Let's just stay right here tonight
At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out
And dance to the moonlight
Cause everything feels right
Been a long day
But it's okay
Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

text:
Allyeojwo neoui oneul
Jjippudunghaetdeon achimbuteo
Manwone nochin bus
Taxireul tayaman haesseotdeon
Rush hour
Neoui pyojeong algo sipeo
Sandeomicheoreom ssain ilgwa saram gwangye
Bap meokgo namyeon seureureu nun gamgineun
Neoui moseup gunggeum neoui haruga gunggeumhae

Jomcheoreom maeumdaero doeji anneun ildeureul
Suhak munjecheoreom pulji mothaedo
Uri saiui gongsigi yeogi isseo baro

Ilgob sie manna yaksok jangso hangang
Dari ogi jeone neorang na kkok manna
Uri gongsik dabi yeogi uri nunape itjana
Gin gin haru jina uri duri manna
Nongdamgeorie jichin harureul hanjan
Bami neomu ppalli onda
Sigana meomchwora
Be here with me

I'm tryna stay afloat but I'm in deep (But I'm in deep)
Oh, I'm so tired I can't even sleep
Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody

And I keep saying okay (Okay)
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say (They say)
While looking like you're happy as hell
Oh, I, I really hope that you feel the same
Oh, I, tonight

Come meet me at seven
And stay 'til eleven
But won't go to bed then
'Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah, it's true though
Kinda cool so
Let's just stay right here tonight (Let's just stay right here)
At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out (Oh)
And dance to the moonlight
'Cause everything feels right (Oh-oh)
Been a long day
But it's okay
'Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be, be here with me

author: @jaejiju
text: I'm preparing for LET (Licensure Examination for Teachers) and lately super busy na kasi malapit na exam. Sunod sunod na din yung review sa review center (city) like almost thrice a week na. Pasado 5pm na natatapos and I have to go home sa province pa. Every time nasa byahe ako saktong 7pm, and I always, like always listen to this song. My mind is so tired, and my body is also exhausted but this song always give me positive energy. It is really comforting — really really comforting. It's like giving me assurance and telling me na it's okay to take a rest for a while. So, BSS my loves! Seungkwan, DK, Hoshi, Peder, and to Woozi and Bumzu as well, thank you so much for creating this masterpiece. Thank you palagi. I will do my best and I will come back here as a licensed professional teacher na. Ily!

author: @rliyza
text:
알려줘 너의 오늘
찌뿌둥했던 아침부터
만원에 놓친 bus
Taxi를 타야만 했었던
Rush hour
너의 표정 알고 싶어
산더미처럼 쌓인 일과 사람 관계
밥 먹고 나면 스르르 눈 감기는
너의 모습 궁금 너의 하루가 궁금해

좀처럼 마음대로 되지 않는 일들을
수학 문제처럼 풀지 못해도
우리 사이의 공식이 여기 있어 바로

7시에 만나 약속 장소 한강
달이 오기 전에 너랑 나 꼭 만나
우리 공식 답이 여기 우리 눈앞에 있잖아
긴 긴 하루 지나 우리 둘이 만나
농담거리에 지친 하루를 한잔
밤이 너무 빨리 온다
시간아 멈춰라
Be here with me

I'm tryna stay afloat but I'm in deep (But I'm in deep)
Oh, I'm so tired I can't even sleep
Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody

And I keep saying okay (Okay)
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say (They say)
While looking like you're happy as hell
Oh, I, I really hope that you feel the same
Oh, I, tonight

Come meet me at seven
And stay 'til eleven
But won't go to bed then
'Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah, it's true though
Kinda cool so
Let's just stay right here tonight (Let's just stay right here)
At seven in my house
We'll sing both our lungs out (Oh)
And dance to the moonlight
'Cause everything feels right (Oh-oh)
Been a long day
But it's okay
'Cause at seven you will be
Be here with me

Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be, be here with me

[Verse 1: SeungKwan, DK]
Allyeojwo neoui oneul

Suhak munjecheoreom pulji mothaedo
Uri saiui gongsigi yеogi isseo baro

Ilgobsie manna yaksok jangso hangang
Dari ogi jeonе neorang na kkok manna

Gin gin haru jina uri duri manna
Nongdamgeorie jichin harureul hanjan
Bami neomu ppalli onda
Sigana meomchwora
Be here with me

[Verse 2: Peder Elias]
I'm tryna stay afloat but I'm in deep
Oh, I'm so tired I can't even sleep
Oh, and I never prioritize my wants and needs
So it goes, on and on, just like a melody

Oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh no
Oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh, you will be here with me

너의 모습 궁금 너의 하루가 궁금해
좀처럼 마음대로 되지 않는 일들을
수학 문제처럼 풀지 못해도

달이 오기 전에 너랑 나 꼭 만나

긴 긴 하루 지나 우리 둘이 만나
농담거리에 지친 하루를 한잔
밤이 너무 빨리 온다
시간아 멈춰라
Be here with me
I’m tryna stay afloat but I’m in deep
Oh I’m so tired I can’t even sleep
Oh and I never prioritize my wants and needs

And I keep saying okay
I never listen to my own heart
I do whatever they say
while looking like you’re happy as hell oh I
I really hope that you feel the same oh I tonight
Come meet me at seven
And stay ‘til eleven
But won’t go to bed then
Cause this feels like heaven
Yeah it’s true tho
Kinda cool so
Let’s just stay right here tonight
At seven in my house

Oh no

author: @나낭-i5d
text: 오늘만큼 이 노래가 와 닿았던 날이 없는 것 같아. 힘겹게 일어나서 허둥지둥 버스를 타러 향했는데 버스를 놓쳐서 택시를 타야만 했고, 산더미처럼 쌓인 일과 사람관계는 종일 숨을 턱 막히게 하더라. 그런 날 있잖아. 뭐든지 내 뜻대로 안 되는 하루. 퇴근하면서 이 노래를 들으니까 왈칵 안도의 눈물이 쏟아지더라. 오늘은 이런 날이었어도 7시에는 괜찮지 않을까, 오늘 7시가 아니라면 내일 7시에는 나 행복하지 않을까? 내일 모레, 일주일 뒤에는 좋은 날이 있지 않을까? 하는 생각이 들어서. 이번 앨범 정말 많은 사람에게 살아갈 동력이 되었을 거야. 이런 에너지와 영향력을 가진 너희가 진심으로 자랑스럽다🤍
